feed.title: HamWAN Memphis Metro Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest HamWAN Memphis Metro news and events.

entry.title: MemHamWAN Expands to Raleigh with New Site on Methodist North Hospital
entry.summary: On February 13, 2016, HamWAN Memphis Metro along with partner Delta Amateur Radio Club deployed a new cell site at Methodist North Hospital. This site is the third such site to be deployed in the region, and soon much of the Delta Amateur Radio Club’...
